author: Harry MacElhone
description: The style of sherry used classically in this Bamboo-style aperitivo is unknown as it is not recorded. We tried fino and amontillado before deciding that a dry oloroso works best by contributing to the drink with almond and peach notes reminiscent of an amaretto.
name: Greenbriar

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
